long_description: The Saturnian I Fun Gripper Flyer sports brilliant colors and a soft, pliable fabric that's easy to throw and catch. Soft nylon fabric encourages challenging flings and catches without hurting your hands. Reversible design flies equally well with either side on top. The Saturnian I Fun Gripper Flyer is light and packable; take it with you almost anywhere for a fun game of catch.
short_description: The Saturnian I Fun Gripper Flyer sports brilliant colors and a soft, pliable fabric that's easy to throw and catch.
